db:abstract.db:para: Q3DTheme class provides a visual style for graphs.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Specifies visual properties that affect the whole graph. There are several built-in themes that can be used as is or modified freely.
The following properties can be overridden by using QAbstract3DSeries properties to set them explicitly in the series: baseColors, baseGradients, and colorStyle.
Themes can be created from scratch using the ThemeUserDefined enum value. Creating a theme using the default constructor produces a new user-defined theme.

db:section.db:title: Default Theme
db:section.db:para: The following table lists the properties controlled by themes and the default values for ThemeUserDefined.

db:section.db:title: Usage Examples
db:section.db:para: Creating a built-in theme without any modifications:
Creating a built-in theme and modifying some properties:

Creating a built-in theme and modifying some properties after it has been set:

db:section.db:title: enum Q3DTheme::ColorStyle
db:section.db:para: Color styles.

db:td.db:para: Objects are rendered in a single color. The color used is specified in baseColors, singleHighlightColor and multiHighlightColor properties.
Objects are colored using a full gradient for each object regardless of object height. The gradient used is specified in baseGradients, singleHighlightGradient and multiHighlightGradient properties.

Objects are colored using a portion of the full gradient determined by the object's height and its position on the Y-axis. The gradient used is specified in baseGradients, singleHighlightGradient and multiHighlightGradient properties.

db:section.db:title: enum Q3DTheme::Theme
db:section.db:para: Built-in themes.

db:td.db:para: A light theme with green as the base color.
A light theme with yellow as the base color.
A light theme with gray as the base color.
A medium dark theme with yellow as the base color.
A medium light theme with blue as the base color.
A medium light theme with brown as the base color.
A dark theme with white as the base color.
A dark theme with yellow as the base color.
A user-defined theme. For more information, see Default Theme.

db:section.db:title: ambientLightStrength : float
db:section.db:para: This property holds the ambient light strength for the whole graph.
This value determines how evenly and brightly the colors are shown throughout the graph regardless of the light position.
The value must be between 0.0f and 1.0f.

db:section.db:title: backgroundColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of the graph background.

db:section.db:title: backgroundEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the background is visible.
The background is drawn by using the value of backgroundColor.

db:section.db:title: baseColors : QList<QColor>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the list of base colors to be used for all the objects in the graph, series by series.
If there are more series than colors, the color list wraps and starts again with the first color in the list.
Has no immediate effect if colorStyle is not ColorStyleUniform.
This value can be overridden by setting the baseColor explicitly in the series.

db:section.db:title: baseGradients : QList<QLinearGradient>
db:section.db:para: This property holds the list of base gradients to be used for all the objects in the graph, series by series.
If there are more series than gradients, the gradient list wraps and starts again with the first gradient in the list
Has no immediate effect if colorStyle is ColorStyleUniform.
This value can be overridden by setting the baseGradient explicitly in the series.

db:section.db:title: colorStyle : Q3DTheme::ColorStyle
db:section.db:para: This property holds the style of the graph colors.
One of the ColorStyle enum values.
This value can be overridden by setting colorStyle explicitly in the series.

db:section.db:title: font : QFont
db:section.db:para: This property holds the font to be used for labels.

db:section.db:title: gridEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the grid lines are drawn.
This value affects all grid lines.

db:section.db:title: gridLineColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of the grid lines.

db:section.db:title: highlightLightStrength : float
db:section.db:para: This property holds the specular light strength for selected objects.
The value must be between 0.0f and 10.0f.

db:section.db:title: labelBackgroundColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of the label backgrounds.
Has no effect if labelBackgroundEnabled is false.

db:section.db:title: labelBackgroundEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the label is drawn with a color background or with a fully transparent background.
The labelBackgroundColor value (including alpha) is used for drawing the background.

Labels with a background are drawn to equal sizes per axis based on the longest label, and the text is centered in them. Labels without a background are drawn as is and are left or right aligned based on their position in the graph.

db:section.db:title: labelBorderEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether label borders are drawn for labels that have a background.
Has no effect if labelBackgroundEnabled is false.

db:section.db:title: labelTextColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of the font used for labels.

db:section.db:title: labelsEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether labels are drawn at all.
If this is false, all other label properties have no effect.

db:section.db:title: lightColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color for the ambient and specular light.
This value affects the light specified in Q3DScene.

db:section.db:title: lightStrength : float
db:section.db:para: This property holds the specular light strength for the whole graph.
The value must be between 0.0f and 10.0f.
This value affects the light specified in Q3DScene.

db:section.db:title: multiHighlightColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the highlight color for selected objects.
Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionRow or QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionColumn flag set.

db:section.db:title: multiHighlightGradient : QLinearGradient
db:section.db:para: This property holds the highlight gradient for selected objects.
Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionRow or QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionColumn flag set.

db:section.db:title: shadowStrength : float
db:section.db:para: This property holds the shadow strength for the whole graph.
The higher the number, the darker the shadows will be. The value must be between 0.0 and 100.0.
This value affects the light specified in Q3DScene.

db:section.db:title: singleHighlightColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the highlight color for a selected object.
Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionItem flag set.

db:section.db:title: singleHighlightGradient : QLinearGradient
db:section.db:para: This property holds the highlight gradient for a selected object.
Used if selectionMode has the QAbstract3DGraph::SelectionItem flag set.

db:section.db:title: type : Q3DTheme::Theme
db:section.db:para: This property holds the type of the theme.

The type is automatically set when constructing a theme, but can also be changed later. Changing the theme type will change all other properties of the theme to what the predefined theme specifies. Changing the theme type of the active theme of the graph will also reset all attached series to use the new theme.

db:section.db:title: windowColor : QColor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the color of the application window the graph is drawn into.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] Q3DTheme::Q3DTheme(QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new theme of type ThemeUserDefined. An optional parent parameter can be given and is then passed to QObject constructor.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] Q3DTheme::Q3DTheme(Q3DTheme::Theme themeType, QObject *parent = nullptr)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new theme with themeType, which can be one of the built-in themes from Theme. An optional parent parameter can be given and is then passed to QObject constructor.

db:section.db:title: [virtual] Q3DTheme::~Q3DTheme()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the theme.
